page.title: 15INDUSTRY & TRADE IN DUDLEY 2
page.content: Recently large local steel works at Brierley hill and Bilston have been closed down,as have many smaller firms.An{Enterprise Zone}has been set up at the edge of the area.Various incentives are offered to attract the industries and jobs of the future. * * * * Dudley's shopping area is concentrated in the High St. At the centre is the recently renovated{open air market,} dating back to the Middle Ages. In recent years many small,local shops have been replaced{large self {service supermarkets}and{department {stores.}Dudley's largest supermarkets are Sainsbury's and Tesco.Other large department stores include Woolworth's Marks & Spencer's,C&A and the locally based Beatties.Also local is Teddy Grays,making and selling it's own confectionary.
